questions.q: When would you prewash your clothes?

choices.t: after wearing them
before washing them to remove stains

questions.q: What does it mean to prepay something?

choices.t: pay for it after using it
pay for it before using it

questions.q: When do you preview a movie?

choices.t: after watching it
before the main show to see a glimpse

questions.q: What does it mean to preheat an oven?

choices.t: heat it after cooking
heat it a few minutes before you're ready to use it

questions.q: What is the meaning of the word 'precaution'?

choices.t: action taken after something happens
action taken to prevent something from happening
after an event takes place
before an event takes place, deciding it in advance

questions.q: When would you use a prefix in a word?

choices.t: at the end of a word
at the beginning of a word to change its meaning
preconceived judgment or opinion without knowledge of the facts
judgment after knowing all the facts

questions.q: When would you prepare a meal?

choices.t: after eating it
before eating it

questions.q: What does it mean to be 'predisposed' to something?

choices.t: having no inclination towards something
having a tendency or inclination towards something in advance
